divs: sighting detailswas waiting in the shaws parkinglot when i saw i bright flash in the sky that seemed to last for a second and 1\2. it flashed into view and out if view quite fast. like a football shaped, traffic-cone-orange light being turned on then off a second later; but you could tell it had substance.
Summary: It flashed into view and out if view quite fast. like a football shaped dark orange light being turned on then off a second later.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Sudbury
There were no other sightings in Sudbury on or around February 14th 1998
